arabic: سَمِعْتُ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ, يَقُولُ : "إِنَّمَا الْأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ, وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى, فَمَنْ كَانَتْ هِجْرَتُهُ إِلَى دُنْيَا يُصِيبُهَا أَوْ إِلَى امْرَأَةٍ يَنْكِحُهَا, فَهِجْرَتُهُ إِلَى مَا هَاجَرَ إِلَيْهِ"
english: I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saying, "The reward of deeds depends upon the intentions and every person will get the reward according to what he has intended. So whoever emigrates for worldly benefits or for a woman to marry, his emigration will be for what he emigrated for."
summary: The reward of deeds depends on intentions, and each person is rewarded for what they intended.

arabic: أَنَّ رَجُلاً سَأَلَ النَّبِيَّ صلى الله عليه وسلم أَىُّ الإِسْلاَمِ خَيْرٌ قَالَ "تُطْعِمُ الطَّعَامَ, وَتَقْرَأُ السَّلاَمَ عَلَى مَنْ عَرَفْتَ وَمَنْ لَمْ تَعْرِفْ"
english: A man asked the Prophet (ﷺ) , "What sort of deeds or (what qualities of) Islam are good?" The Prophet (ﷺ) replied, 'To feed (the poor) and greet those whom you know and those whom you do not know"
summary: A man asked the Prophet (ﷺ) what deeds of Islam are good. He replied: "to feed the poor and great those you know and don't know"

arabic: عَنِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم قَالَ "لا يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ"
english: The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "None of you will have faith till he wishes for his (Muslim) brother what he likes for himself."
summary: The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "None of you will have faith till he wishes for his (Muslim) brother what he likes for himself."

arabic: أَنَّ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم قَالَ "فَوَالَّذِي نَفْسِي بِيَدِهِ, لاَ يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى أَكُونَ أَحَبَّ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ وَالِدِهِ وَوَلَدِهِ"
english: "Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "By Him in Whose Hands my life is, none of you will have faith till he loves me more than his father and his children."
summary: "Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "By Him in Whose Hands my life is, none of you will have faith till he loves me more than his father and his children."
